home.title: Grace & Light - A Christian Sanctuary
home.description: A sacred space where faith flourishes, hope is renewed, and hearts find peace in God's eternal love. Join our community as we walk together in the light of Christ.
home.heart_of_faith_desc: Christianity is not just a religion—it's a relationship with the living God through Jesus Christ. Discover the transformative power of God's love in your life.
home.grace_desc: God's unmerited favor flows freely to all who believe. Through grace, we are saved, forgiven, and transformed—not by our works, but by His love.
home.faith_desc: Faith is the bridge between our hearts and God's promises. It's trusting in what we cannot see and holding fast to eternal hope.
home.love_desc: God's love is the foundation of everything. We love because He first loved us, and this love compels us to serve others with compassion.
home.journey_title: Begin Your Journey with Christ Today
home.journey_desc: Whether you're taking your first steps in faith or seeking to deepen your relationship with God, you're welcome here. Let's walk this path together.
blog.title: Blog - Grace & Light
blog.description: Spiritual reflections, Christian insights, and faith-based articles to encourage and inspire your journey with God.
blog.header_desc: Discover encouraging articles, biblical insights, and practical wisdom for your Christian journey. Let these reflections inspire and strengthen your faith.
blog.newsletter_desc: Join our newsletter to receive weekly reflections, Bible verses, and encouragement delivered to your inbox.
about.title: About Us - Grace & Light
about.description: Learn about our mission to share God's love and provide spiritual encouragement through faith-based content and community.
about.header_desc: We are a community dedicated to sharing the transformative love of Jesus Christ and providing spiritual encouragement for believers in their faith journey.
about.mission_desc1: Grace & Light exists to be a beacon of hope in a world that often feels dark and uncertain. We believe that every person is beloved by God and deserves to experience His peace, love, and grace.
about.mission_desc2: Through carefully curated Bible verses, thoughtful reflections, and encouraging content, we aim to meet people wherever they are in their spiritual journey and point them toward the light of Christ.
about.mission_verse: "Let your light shine before others, that they may see your good deeds and glorify your Father in heaven." - Matthew 5:16
about.values_desc: These principles guide everything we do and shape how we serve our community.
about.value1_desc: God's Word is our foundation. Every piece of content is rooted in biblical truth and designed to help believers grow in their understanding of Scripture.
about.value2_desc: Christ's love compels us to serve others with compassion, grace, and understanding. We believe love is the greatest commandment and the key to transformation.
about.value3_desc: We believe faith grows best in community. Our goal is to create a welcoming space where believers can encourage one another and grow together.
about.team_desc: Meet the dedicated servants who help bring Grace & Light to life.
about.team_member1_desc: With over 15 years in ministry, Pastor David brings deep theological insight and pastoral heart to our content creation.
about.team_member2_desc: A devoted servant with a gift for writing, Sister Mary Catherine ensures our content reflects God's heart for His people.
about.team_member3_desc: Pastor James brings fresh perspective and connects with believers of all ages through relatable, practical teachings.
about.cta_desc: Whether you're seeking comfort, looking for spiritual growth, or wanting to connect with fellow believers, you have a place here. Let's walk this journey of faith together.
verses.title: Bible Verses - Grace & Light
verses.description: Find comfort and inspiration in God's word. Browse Bible verses by emotion and life situation.
verses.header_desc: God's word speaks to every situation and emotion. Discover verses that bring peace to your heart and strength to your soul.
verses.search_placeholder: Search verses by keyword or emotion...
contact.title: Contact Us - Grace & Light
contact.description: Get in touch with our ministry team. We'd love to hear from you and pray with you.
contact.header_desc: We'd love to hear from you. Whether you need prayer, have questions about faith, or simply want to connect with our community, we're here for you.
contact.form_message_placeholder: Please share what's on your heart. We're here to listen and pray with you.
contact.form_newsletter: I'd like to receive weekly encouragement and updates via email
contact.prayer_desc: Our prayer team is committed to lifting up your needs before God. No request is too big or too small.
contact.prayer_verse: "Therefore I tell you, whatever you ask for in prayer, believe that you have received it, and it will be yours." - Mark 11:24
contact.commitment_item3: • All messages treated with confidentiality and care
contact.commitment_item4: • Personal responses from our ministry team
